thought: To craft red_sandstone_wall, I need to first craft red_sandstone. Red_sandstone requires placing 4 red_sand side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the red_sand from slot 25 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 2 with quantity 1
